resources.string: Ba a fara sabis na samun dama ba
Ana kunna sabis na samun dama amma baya gudana, zaka iya gwada sake kunnawa ko sake kunna wayarka
An kasa kunna sabis na samun dama tare da tushen gata
Kafa
Aikin rubutun
Yi amfani da sabis na gaba don kiyaye ƙa\'idodin ku yana gudana
Sabis na Samun dama
Tagan mai iyo
Dole ne a kunna ayyukan sabis na isa don aiwatarwa (ajiya)
Dole ne ku buɗe taga mai iyo don duba log ɗin (abin da aka keɓe)
Maɓallin ƙarar ƙara yana dakatar da duk rubutun
Bayan buɗewa, gudanar da rubutun zai buɗe sabis ɗin samun dama ta atomatik tare da gatan Tushen (abun da aka keɓe)
Ba da damar sabis ta atomatik tare da tushen gata
Binciken shimfidar wuri ya fi karko idan an kunna shi, amma ƙaramin adadin rubutun ƙila ba sa aiki da kyau. Sake kunna sabis na samun dama don aiwatarwa
Yanayin barga
Sabis na Samun dama
Kar a nuna babban dubawa
Gudun rubutun kai tsaye bayan buɗe app
Boye log
Ba a nuna madaidaicin log ɗin ba, kuma ana buƙatar tallafin rubutun don buɗe wannan keɓancewar lokaci na gaba
Sauran
\n ------------ \n [ %s ] Ya ƙare a cikin %f seconds
E-mail
Kalmar sirri
Shiga ko rajista
Shiga
\"barka da zuwa!\"
Ba ingantaccen sunan mai amfani ba ne
Dole ne kalmar wucewa ta fi haruffa 5
\"Login kasa\"

Software yana buƙatar buɗe \"Sabis na Dama\" don aiki, da fatan za a buɗe \"Settings->Sabis na Dama\" ko \"Saituna->Sabis na Dama->Ƙarin Sabis ɗin da Aka Sauke\", nemo\" %s \", kuma kunna Sabis na Samun dama
Ana buƙatar kunna sabis na samun dama
Sanarwar sanarwa koyaushe zata nuna sanarwar \"Wannan app yana gudana\" don kiyaye shirin yana gudana
Budewa
Soke
Yana buƙatar izini don buɗe abin dubawa a bango
Yana buƙatar izini don buɗe abin dubawa a bango don aiki, da fatan za a je zuwa saitunan don buɗewa
Ana buƙatar izinin taga mai iyo
Da fatan za a kunna izini kafin a yi aiki!
Ba a kunna sabis na samun dama ba
Ana kunna damar shiga
Maimaituwa
Share fage
Daina gudu
